original_text: This is what he showed me: The Lord was standing by a wall that had been built true to plumb, with a plumb line in his hand.
korean_text: 또 내게 보이신 것이 이러하니라 다림줄을 가지고 쌓은 담 곁에 주께서 손에 다림줄을 잡고 서셨더니

sentences.original_text: This is what he showed me:
The Lord was standing by a wall
that had been built true to plumb,
with a plumb line in his hand.
